headline: Biggest Stocks in the S&P 500 Are the Place to Be for Inflation
summary: When costs rise, gross margins can drop because most firms can’t lift prices enough to keep the same margins.  From 2012 though May, the top 50 have usually seen far smaller drops in gross margins than smaller companies when the rate of CPI inflation rises, according to Trivariate Research.

raw.headline: Biggest Stocks in the S&P 500 Are the Place to Be for Inflation
raw.summary: When costs rise, gross margins can drop because most firms can’t lift prices enough to keep the same margins. headline: AIWA's Exos-5 Hi-Fi Speaker Now Available at Walmart Stores Nationwide
summary: AIWA, a leading global consumer electronics company, today announces the availability of its Exos-5 Wireless Home Speaker in Walmart stores. Adding this innovative speaker from AIWA's popular Exos line represents a significant step forward for the company as it continues to make its premium portable audio experiences more accessible to everyday consumers.
